name: Staked OGN
description: Staked OGN (xOGN) represents Origin tokens (OGN) that have been locked up in return for staking rewards as well as voting rights in the Origin DAO. Staking rewards for xOGN holders are derived from performance fees on Origin's products. xOGN tokens are non-transferrable. Holders select a lock duration between one month and one year, though they may unlock early for a small penalty.
